post:
TNAHosting is happy to offer some deals on KVM and Dedicated servers. We’ve been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost-effective services. All servers are located in Chicago, IL. Dedicated servers have very limited stock, so don’t wait too long!  
  
**--Dedicated Servers--**
- SynergyCP Control Panel  
- Automated OS Installs  
- IP KVM  
- Remote Reboot    
   
  
**E3-1271v3 Dedicated Server**    
* E3-1271v3 - 4 Cores / 8 Threads @ 3.6GHz / 4.00GHz Turbo  
* 16GB DDR3  
* 500GB HDD  
* 15TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* /29 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)  
* $39/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=88&promocode=1271V3-39)  
  
  
  
**Dual L5420 Dedicated Server**    
* Dual L5420 - 8 Cores @ 2.5GHz  
* 24GB DDR2  
* 2TB HDD  
* 15TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* /29 IPv4  
* $19/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=12&promocode=L5420-19)  
  
  
  
**--SSD KVM--**  
  
**SSD KVM 8GB**    
* 4x vCPU  
* 8GB RAM  
* 100GB SSD  
* 10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* 1 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)   
* $9/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=89)  
  
  
  
**4GB SSD KVM**    
* 2x vCPU  
* 4GB RAM  
* 75GB SSD  
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* 1 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)  
* $5/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=90)  
  
  
  
**1GB SSD KVM**    
* 2x vCPU  
* 1GB RAM  
* 50GB SSD  
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* 1 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)  
* $15/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=91)  
  
  
  
**--Shared Hosting--**  
**5GB DA Shared Hosting**    
* 5GB SSD  
* Unmetered Bandwidth  
* Softaculous  
* $5/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=58)  


  
Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment. Dedicated servers will be setup within 1-3 business days.  
  
Chicago Looking Glass: http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/  
  
We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.  
  
Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or [open a sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2).
